formElement.documentation: The ID or the name of the definition. This is required.
formElement.label: Definition ID or name:

formElement.documentation: The ID or the name of the queue. This is optional. If not specified, the default queue for the definition will be used.
formElement.label: Queue ID or name:

formElement.documentation: The branch to build. This is optional. If not specified, the default branch for the definition will be used.
formElement.label: Source branch:

formElement.documentation: If checked, the procedure will wait for build to finish.
formElement.label: Wait for build:

formElement.documentation: Timeout in second to wait for build to finish. Will be used if "Wait for build" is checked.
formElement.label: Wait timeout:

formElement.documentation: If checked, the procedure status will mimic build status. If build has failed, the procedure status will be "Failed", if build has succeeded, the status will be "Success" and "Warning" otherwize.
formElement.label: Mimic build status:

formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Parameters to pass to the build. This is optional.
E.g., 
{"system.debug":"true","BuildConfiguration":"debug","BuildPlatform":"x64"}
If not specified, the default variables for the definition will be used.
formElement.label: Parameters:

formElement.documentation: Results will be saved into this property/property sheet.
formElement.label: Property sheet name for results:
